# Math3d 
3D Math Demonstrations powered by [MathBox](https://gitgud.io/unconed/mathbox) 

## Demos

- [Basic App](http://math3d.org)
- [Velocity, Acceleration Animation](http://math3d.org?)
- [Ruled Hyperbola Animation](http://math3d.org?)
- [3d Integration, Rectangular Slices](http://math3d.org?) 
- [3d Integration, Cylindrical Slices](http://math3d.org?)
- [Spherical Volume Element](http://math3d.org?)
